hero_title: AI and Optimization That Drive Business.
casos_tittle: From Data to Deployment in Just Weeks
hero_subtitle: From airlines to consumer goods, Tulipán helps businesses unlock efficiency and growth through custom optimization, forecasting, and AI tools.
about_p1: Tulipán is a lab of applied mathematics and artificial intelligence. We design custom models and digital tools that boost revenue, reduce costs, and unlock new opportunities across industries.
about_p2: Our team of PhDs, engineers, and developers works hand-in-hand with clients to deploy powerful solutions in record time—often in weeks, not years.
cap_title: Built for Complexity. Designed for Impact.
cap_subtitle: We combine applied mathematics, artificial intelligence, and advanced engineering to deliver custom solutions that generate efficiency, reduce costs, and unlock growth.
team_advisors_description: We have an advisory board made up of senior executives from various industries who have led large-scale transformations, made critical decisions, and experienced the most complex business environments firsthand. Their experience helps us focus on what truly generates value—and ensures we always work on what truly drives impact.
